objects.specification: A large rectangular floor panel forming the base of the exhibition booth. It features a smooth matte finish in a neutral light gray tone to provide a subtle and consistent backdrop for all display elements.
A tall rectangular wall panel for the exhibition booth. It has a flat smooth surface in a neutral medium-light gray tone, providing a clean backdrop for branding and graphic elements.
A tall rectangular wall panel for the exhibition booth. It has a flat smooth surface in a neutral medium-light gray tone, providing a clean backdrop for branding and graphic elements.
A tall rectangular wall panel for the exhibition booth. It has a flat smooth surface in a neutral medium-light gray tone, providing a clean backdrop for branding and graphic elements.
A tall rectangular wall panel for the exhibition booth. It has a flat smooth surface in a neutral medium-light gray tone, providing a clean backdrop for branding and graphic elements.

A realistically scaled modern demo car with an aerodynamic silhouette, detailed body contours, and a glossy bright red finish. It features four intricately modeled wheels, door handles, mirrors, and headlamp details that make it stand out as the centerpiece of the booth.

A modern reception desk with a sleek minimalist design, featuring a smooth countertop surface and integrated storage compartments beneath. The desk is finished in a complementary neutral gray tone and sized to comfortably accommodate one receptionist.
A contemporary high stool with a round padded seat upholstered in charcoal gray fabric, supported by sleek metal legs. The design is minimal yet comfortable, suitable for casual visitor seating.
A contemporary high stool with a round padded seat upholstered in charcoal gray fabric, supported by sleek metal legs. The design is minimal yet comfortable, suitable for casual visitor seating.
A contemporary high stool with a round padded seat upholstered in charcoal gray fabric, supported by sleek metal legs. The design is minimal yet comfortable, suitable for casual visitor seating.
A contemporary high stool with a round padded seat upholstered in charcoal gray fabric, supported by sleek metal legs. The design is minimal yet comfortable, suitable for casual visitor seating.
A tall freestanding brochure display stand with a sturdy rectangular metal frame in mid-gray, featuring a top shelf angled slightly for easy access to promotional flyers and brochures.
A tall freestanding brochure display stand with a sturdy rectangular metal frame in mid-gray, featuring a top shelf angled slightly for easy access to promotional flyers and brochures.

A large horizontal fabric banner featuring vibrant car graphics and brand logos, printed in high resolution on durable material. It includes reinforced edges and invisible mounting points for a clean integrated look on the back wall.
A decorative potted plant with lush green foliage in a simple cylindrical planter. The leaves are detailed and vibrant, adding a natural accent and fresh contrast to the booth environment.
A decorative potted plant with lush green foliage in a simple cylindrical planter. The leaves are detailed and vibrant, adding a natural accent and fresh contrast to the booth environment.
A ceiling-mounted spotlight fixture with a conical head and adjustable swivel joint. It has a soft off-white housing and a focused beam to highlight the central demo car below.
